channel.title: Cloud Architect on JuanBC - Cloud Architect
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud Architect on JuanBC - Cloud Architect

item.title: Stories
item.description: Coca-Cola I’ve worked in CI&T for the Coca-Cola, and I’ve worked directly with the Atlanta Based client. The job was about to help markets around the world to change the content, by using an Adobe CMS: Adobe Experience Manager. Coca-Cola Frontend When in Coca-Cola I’ve also had the opportunity to work with Front-end in the CMS, however for the USA Market instead of the Global Market. Google + Globo Digital Migration As a first experience as a Cloud Architect I was able to work in the Google Project digital migration for the Globo Television, a main player in the South America when related to Television, Broadcasting, and Entertainment.

item.title: Experiences
item.description: I have experience in the following tech: Google Cloud Platform (gcp) IaC - Terraform GCE, GKE - Kubernetes, Cloud Build, App Engine, Cloud Monitoring, Cloud Functions, Billing Google Cloud Networking AWS - S3, CloudFront, Route53, Lambda Azure - DNS, VMs, Storage Oracle Cloud Infrastructure VMs Akamai CDN Clouflare Jenkins Versionamento via Github, Gitlab, Bitbucket Backlog via Jira, Asana, Trello

item.title: Google Cloud DNS HA
